(Image credit: The Style Stalker)

No outfit is more classic (or easy) than jeans and a T-shirt. Although, even this go-to combination can feel a bit dull at times. Fortunately, there are simple ways to spruce up this casual ensemble without much effort. All it takes is a little bit of outfit inspiration.

Influenced by some of our favorite celebs and street style stars, we're showing you how to style T-shirts and jeans for an updated look. Not only have we rounded up ways to freshen up this combination, but we've also provided quality basics you can add to your look. So next time you're feeling stumped on what to wear with your favorite pair of jeans, pull inspiration from these outfits and you'll be good to go.

Go for a Cool Coat and Platform Shoes

(Image credit: Marc Piasecki/GC Images)

Platform shoes and a shearling coat give this classic ensemble a forward twist.

On Kendall Jenner: Komono sunglasses; Designers Remix jacket; Kurt Geiger tote; Stella McCartney shoes

BlankNYC Bonded Faux Shearling Jacket $98 SHOP NOW We like how this silhouette is a bit more relaxed.

Madewell Whisper Cotton Ribbed Crewneck T-Shirt $20 SHOP NOW Madewell has been making this tee forever, and with good reason!

Agolde Riley High Rise Straight Crop Jeans $178 SHOP NOW Agolde is the gold standard in denim.

Vans Platform Slip-On Sneakers $55 SHOP NOW The platform gives these classic slip-on sneakers a fashion spin.

Tuck In Your Tee and Add a Pair of Chic Heels

(Image credit: Getty Images)

Love the classic jeans-and-tee look? Give the look an update by tucking in the top and adding some cool heels. A statement blazer will only enhance the look even more.

Who What Wear Collection Erin Crew-Neck Bodysuit $55 SHOP NOW A bodysuit will help keep a streamlined tucked-in look.

Joseph Double-Breasted Shantung Blazer $835 $250 SHOP NOW We've never seen a prettier shade of lavender.

Agolde Lana Mid Rise Vintage Straight Jeans $188 SHOP NOW Relaxed with the perfect vintage wash.

Topshop Dream Braid Slide Sandals $52 SHOP NOW We agree with Topshop in calling these the "dream" sandals.

Add a Blazer

(Image credit: Bauer-Griffin/GC Images)

For a classic look, wear a white blazer and platform shoes.

On Jessica Alba: 7 for All Mankind jeans; Brian Atwood sandals

Hanes Perfect-T Short Sleeve Shirt $8 SHOP NOW Hanes knows tees.

Lioness Palermo Blazer $88 SHOP NOW Lioness blazers always look more expensive than they are.

DL1961 Rachel High Rise Flare Jeans $199 SHOP NOW Leave it to Jessica Alba to inspire us to break out our flare jeans.

Cult Gaia Nev Platforms $428 SHOP NOW It's the sculptural wooden heel for us.

Layer on a Utility Jacket

(Image credit: Getty Images)

An of-the-moment utility jacket gives this look a cool feel.

Madewell Whisper Cotton V-Neck T-Shirt $20 SHOP NOW More Madewell tees, because we couldn't resist.

Karen Kane Linen Blend Cargo Jackets $138 $83 SHOP NOW This classic cargo jacket will work just as well in spring.

Madewell Slim Demi-Boot Jeans in Enright Wash $128 SHOP NOW A little peek of ankle is perfect for showing off your sneakers.

Fila Renno N Generation Sneakers $75 SHOP NOW We weren't going to leave you without the sneaker rec!

Toss on a Statement Coat

(Image credit: Robino Salvatore/GC Images)

Elevate a graphic tee even more by tossing on a bold coat and opting for ankle boots.

On Gigi Hadid: Parker Smith jeans

Treasure & Bond Bob Marley Band Graphic Tee $29 SHOP NOW Don't worry about a thing—(with this tee) every little thing's going to be all right.

Harris Wharf London Double-Breasted Buttoned Coat Now that's a coat color you don't see every day.

Levi's 724 High Rise Straight Crop Jeans $98 SHOP NOW With denim prices higher than ever, there's something sweet about Levi's price point.

Who What Wear Christina Boots $149 SHOP NOW Call us biased, but these will be a wardrobe workhorse.
